title: Understanding Flash Fill
text: Flash Fill is a feature in Excel that automatically fills your data when it senses a pattern. It can be used to quickly format or extract data without using complex formulas.

title: Activating Flash Fill
text: You can activate Flash Fill by either using the autocomplete feature or by clicking on the Flash Fill button in the Data Tools group on the Data tab.

hintAnswer: either use autocomplete or click on the Flash Fill button
title: Using Flash Fill
text: What are the two ways to use Flash Fill in Excel?
choices: either use autocomplete or click on the Flash Fill button
click on the Flash Fill button
